title: How are internships provided in Amity for an MA in clinical psychology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Psychology training in the area of clinical psychology at Amity is strongly hands on training base during Masters. They are provided exposure to mental health set ups, medical set up, community mental health set up and areas like Population psychology base mental health issues like in the population of destitutes and homeless.

The internship opportunities are great and cater to a wide variety of population where you get hands on clinical training. you get to work at hospitals , rehab centres , Centres of homeless and old age population as wel.

Usually Amity University has tie up with some Psychiatric hospital/clinics where they send their student for internships. If not, students can also contact some such facility on their own and after satisfactory completion of their intership recieve a certificate for the same.
